description: This table contains any free text comments about positioning special needs in the case record.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: POS_FREETEXT
columns.description: The free text response for the special positioning needs required for the case request.
